title: Pixel 4 Bluetooth and Wifi issue
content:
Hi all, 

My Pixel 4 stopped connecting to any Bluetooth devices but Wifi worked and needed to be needed to within 1 meter to the router. 

Has anyone had similar experience.

Tried the following but nothing worked:

Factory reset
Went into safe mode to check if Wifi worked
Resetting network
Checked router and connect using another device, Wifi wasn't the issue
